about_the_game: Explore an explosive world in this fast-paced action, adventure and platform game! Take control of a fearless bomb with a short fuse as you make your way through a factory filled with deadly traps, challenging platforms, and relentless robotic enemies. Jump, dodge and time your every move, because death lurks around every corner – from treacherous cliffs and crushing gears to enemy attacks and the constant threat of running out of fuse. Find spare parts to extend your time and overcome challenges in a frantic attempt to reach the central core and destroy it before it explodes. Will you be able to save humanity or will you succumb to chaos? The countdown has begun!
